Contents.Content: SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,pmi.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,pmi.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,pmi.name AS PatientName ,pmi.sex AS PatientSex ,pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,pmi.Mailing_address as PatientAddress ,NULL AS HighRiskInfectivity FROM Pat_master_index pmi where 1=1 {0}

SELECT pih.patient_id as InPatientCode, pih.Dept_code AS WardArea, pih.Ward_Code AS InDepartment, pih.Nursing_Class AS Nursing, pih.Bed_no AS BedNumber, pih.doctor_in_charge as InPatientDoctor, NULL AS BedNurse FROM Pats_in_hospital pih WHERE rownum <= 200 {0}

SELECT opn.Operation AS OperationName, pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode, om.Oper_id AS OperationID, om.Operating_dept AS OperationDepartment, om.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, om.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, om.Start_date_time AS OperationDate, om.Start_date_time AS OperationBegin, om.End_date_time AS OperationEnd, om.First_operation_nurse AS HandWashingNurse1, om.Second_operation_nurse AS HandWashingNurse2, om.First_supply_nurse AS ItinerateNurse1, om.Second_supply_nurse AS ItinerateNurse2, NULL AS OperationOrderCode, NULL AS OperationStatus FROM Operation_master om ,Pat_master_index pmi ,Operation_Name opn where om.Patient_id=pmi.Patient_id and om.Patient_Id = opn.Patient_Id AND om.Visit_Id = opn.Visit_Id AND om.Oper_Id = opn.Oper_Id and rownum <= 200 {0} order by om.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS RegisterCode, cm.Visit_no AS RegisterNumber, cm.Visit_dept AS RegisterDepartment, cm.Visit_date AS RegisterDateTime, cm.Clinic_type AS OutPatientEmergency FROM Clinic_master cm ,Pat_master_index pmi where cm.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id {0} Order By Visit_Date DESC

SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,pmi.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,pmi.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,pmi.name AS PatientName ,pmi.sex AS PatientSex ,pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,pmi.Mailing_address as PatientAddress FROM Pat_master_index pmi WHERE rownum <= 200 {0}

SELECT pmi.Inp_no AS VALUE, pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode, opn.Operation AS NAME, pmi.name AS PatientName, pmi.sex AS PatientSex, pmi.name AS DISPLAYNAME, pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday, opn.Operation AS OperationName, om.Oper_id AS OperationID, om.Operating_dept AS OperationDepartment, om.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, om.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, om.Start_date_time AS OperationDate FROM Operation_master om ,Pat_master_index pmi ,Operation_Name opn where om.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id and om.Patient_Id = opn.Patient_Id AND om.Visit_Id = opn.Visit_Id AND om.Oper_Id = opn.Oper_Id and rownum <= 200 {0} Order By om.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS VALUE, pmi.Patient_id AS InPatientCode, pmi.name AS NAME, pmi.sex AS PatientSex, pmi.name AS DISPLAYNAME, Pats_in_hospital.Ward_Code AS WardArea, floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge, pih.Dept_code AS InDepartment, pih.Nursing_Class AS Nursing, pih.bed_no AS Bedno, NULL AS BedNurse, NULL AS InPatientDoctor FROM Pats_in_hospital pih ,Pat_master_index pmi where pih.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id {0}

SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS VALUE, cm.Visit_no AS VisitNo, pmi.name AS NAME, pmi.sex AS SEX, pmi.name AS DISPLAYNAME, cm.Visit_dept AS VisitDepartment, cm.Visit_date AS VisitDate, cm.Clinic_type AS ClinicType, pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday FROM Clinic_master cm ,Pat_master_index pmi where cm.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id and rownum <= 200 {0} Order By VisitDate DESC
